title: My life with Noel
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Indigenous peoples - Social life and customs

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Foster home care
abstract: 'The influence of the older women in our lives'.
description: Bess Yarram shares the things closest to her heart. After meeting her husband in bording school, he joined the army and, from then on, the family moved with him. There was always room for one more foster child in this family but Yarram wouldn't have been able to cope if it wasn't for the support of the older women, the mothers and aunts that provided support and guidance.
